explanation: Funds provided as part of the April 25, 2022, internal reprograming action FY 22-19 IR (Tranche #2) are transferred back to the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide, 22/23, appropriation. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget requirement.
